name: Aqueduct
description: A massive structure carrying water over long distances provides essential water supply to settlements, while representing engineering marvels. The vital function makes it a target for sabotage, while the elevated structure can provide defensive advantages. Additionally, a massive aqueduct provides essential water supply to settlements, offering life-giving resources and engineering marvels, but the vital nature makes it a target for sabotage and control. the engineering achievement provides reliable water supply and transportation, while the vital function makes it a strategic target for enemies.
atmosphere: Massive stone arches span valleys and hills carrying fresh water across great distances. Flowing water echoes through the channels while maintenance walkways run alongside. The air carries fresh water and weathered stone scents. Engineering inscriptions mark the builders' achievements.
